Frenchpress Coffee.instructions: Grind beans, boil water to 90 degrees, mix well. Wait 7 minutes.

PotBread.instructions: Mix well, place in pot overnight. Fold. Bake 250 degrees for 30 minutes. Take lid off, lower temp to 225 degreess for 15 minutes. Eat!

Andreas Chili Stew.instructions: Mix and simmer for a long time.
